title: 1 bed / 1 bath with waterview of Greenwich Bay

1 mile fro Goddard Park, 5 minute walk to Sandy Point beach
~800 square feet
Built in 2019
Balcony off the living area, fenced patio on ground level perfect for lounging or grilling
Separate living area on ground floor that could be used as an office or den
Off-street parking
Washer, dryer in unit
A/C
Open concept living area
AVAILABLE IMMEDIATELY
MOVE-IN INCENTIVE FOR LEASE SIGNED BY THE END OF JANUARY

title: 2 Bedroom Includes Heat, gas, and Electric.
description: Clean, Quite Neighborhood, LARGE Yard, off street parking, Spacious, in older Multi family building, Great mature neighbors, Lots of character. First Floor, Galley style Kitchen with room for a table, 2 Bedroom, one on first floor one on the 2nd floor. Sunny unit.  Bathroom has a tub  $1010.00 per month ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED, Except AC, if you want it AC we charge $ 10.00 per week for each week you have one installed.  Heat, Gas, hot water, and Electric Located on the HUNT RIVER Great FISHING HOLE and launching area for PADDLING! Sorry No Washer or Dryer hookups. Only 2 minutes to the highway. Near the East Greenwich line.
The ceiling are low please if you are over 5'9" you are to tall and will not be happy!

title: Hill and harbor rental
description: Beautiful apartment on the hill for rent. Private entrance washer and dryer hookup in Bldg. Bathroom and kitchen newly remodeled. 4 parking spaces off road. Short walk to all that Main Street has to offer. 1 Dog is allowed.

title: 66 Long street 1st floor 2 bedroom apartment
description: This 2 Bedroom 1st Floor Unit is Very Spacious and Close to Water and Historic Downtown East Greenwich. Features 2 bedrooms approximately 13x13, Large Eat In Kitchen. Kitchen is Approximately 13x13 and Spacious Den/Living Room also 13x13. Coin Op laundry in basement, parking for 2 cars. Freshly painted inside hardwood floors throughout. This won't last long. Available March 1st 2020. Information is deemed to be correct but not guaranteed.

title: Lease to Own Program - Low Money Down
description: RENT-TO-OWN. Challenged Credit Ok! Option price $429,000
For more info and pictures: Copy and Paste this link: https://showmojo.com/l/21561ae00a
This lovely renovated home is located in the Sun Ridge neighborhood of the desirable East Greenwich. You'll love this Contemporary Cape with full dormer for your family.

Enjoy life in this 5 bed 3 bath, single family home conveniently located near TF Green Airport & Train Stations. And only 20 minutes from Providence. You'll love the full open floor plan for entertaining your friends and family and the finished walkout lower level with full bath , which makes it excellent in-law potential, and a the town's well maintained neighborhood playground.
.Rent-to-own: 18 month lease term, monthly rent is $2995. Option to buy with-in lease term period is between 3.5% - 5% option fee down payment ($15,015 - $21,450).
.Property will be available April, 1, 2020, so secure your future home now.

100% of the Option Fee Down Payment counts towards the option price of the home later on when you go to exercise your option to purchase the house (so it’s NOT like an extra fee just to rent-to-own… ALL of it counts towards the house), but it is always going to be much more than a typical security deposit for a straight rental… Also, challenged credit OK for rent-to-own! We don’t have a “credit score requirement” per se as in a specific #, but we do review your reports to make sure you have a clear game plan on what you need to do to get up to a 640 during the rental phase of the rent-to-own. Rest assured, we work with credit challenges all the time!
To Schedule a showing call
show contact info

title: Hill Area East Greenwich
description: Great first floor apartment in a historic Victorian. Completely renovated less than a year ago. All new appliances and laundry in the apartment. Close to main st and Eldridge elementary school.

title: House available  in East Greenwich
description: Meticulously maintained 3 bedroom 2 bathroom Ranch available March 1st!!!! This Beautiful home is minutes from Main Street of East Greenwich , Highway access , Schools and Shopping centers. First Month and Security Deposit  required to move in. No Utilities included.

title: North Kingstown 2 Bed 1 Bath
description: This 2nd floor apartment is located near Rt 95 and has a private entrance. The unit offers 2 bedrooms with carpets,  1 bath and an eat-it kitchen. You also get a shared yard with off street parking. Rent also includes heat and hot water.
Non-refundable $35 fee for Credit and Background check required
Text for a quicker response to schedule a showing!

title: Brothers need a new home
description: Hello, on Christmas Day my family of 11 had our house get condemned and had to find new place. Family found a new home but not big enough for all 11, so me and my brother are trying to find an apartment for us. Two hard working guys just need a good place to stay. We together just need a 2 bed place willing to pay at least $1200 a month, everything included would be nice as well. Please email me, and please no scams. Thank you

title: 2 bedroom apartment available in East Greenwich
description: Completely remodeled five years ago. Second floor 2 bedroom very bright, fully applianced eat in kitchen, b new heat and hot water, coin-op laundry, 2 parking space. Available for occupancy on January 14. $1100 per month pets are negotiable no smoking.

title: UPDATED 'COTTAGE CHARM' APARTMENT, - 1 BEDROOM-ALL UTILITIES INCL.
description: APARTMENT ATTRIBUTES:
A BRIGHT, LIGHT APARTMENT FACING SOUTH .
ENJOY
QUIET CONTEMPLATION IN PARK LIKE SURROUNDINGS &
TRANQUIL VIEWS
FROM APARTMENT.
COMMON ENTRANCE HALLWAY SPACE FOR PACKAGE DROP OFF
WITH SUN OUT BUT ON THE COLDEST DAYS, PRIVATE PORCH'S TEMPERATURE IS VERY COMFORTABLE FOR EXTRA LIVING SPACE.
HARDWOOD FLOORS.

15' X 15' LIVING ROOM W/ NON WORKING FIREPLACE. ROOM LARGE ENOUGH TO ACCOMMODATE DINING TABLE AND CHAIRS. (APARTMENT LIVING ROOM PICS INCLUDE ONES TAKEN WHEN FURNISHED DURING AN EARLIER TENANT OCCUPANCY).
HALL FIXTURES; MIRROR, SHELF, COAT RACK INCLUDED FOR YOUR CONVENIENCE. OTHER NECESSITIES ARE AVAILABLE DEPENDING ON NEW TENANT’S NEEDS.
NEW BATHROOM W/ 36" VANITY AND TILED SHOWER. THOUGHTFUL STORAGE NEEDS.
WASHER/DRYER IN APARTMENT.
NEWLY REMODELED COMPACT KITCHEN WITH ALL THE CONVENIENCES OF A MUCH LARGER KITCHEN INCLUDING DROP LEAF WALL HUNG TABLE FOR EXTRA COUNTER WHEN NEEDED, OR HANDY BREAKFAST/ STUDY NOOK.
1 BEDROOM WITH 5' CLOSET FOR STORAGE, FURNITURE OR CLOTHING; ADDITIONAL EXTRA DEEP 12' OF  CLOTHING /ACCESSORY SPACE.
'MOCK BED IS SIZED AS QUEEN. CAN ACCOMMODATE KING SIZE WITHOUT SACRIFICE OF SPACE.
1  PARKING SPACE IN OUR PRIVATE LOT. CONVENIENT GUEST PARKING AVAILABLE..
MAILBOX ON GROUNDS.
CUSTOM, QUALITY PRIVACY WINDOW TREATMENTS IN EVERY ROOM.
1/2 BLOCK TO EAST GREENWICH'S MAIN ST WITH ITS MANY SHOPS AND RESTAURANTS...WITHOUT THE RUCKUS. ALL NEATLY ORGANIZED IN A MILE AND A HALF OF A TOWN THAT IS MADE FOR STROLLING.
EAST  GREENWICH  BOASTS A STRONG SENSE OF AN OPEN COMMUNITY WITH MANY PUBLIC ACTIVITIES AND CELEBRATIONS THROUGHOUT THE YEAR.
4 WALK-ABLE BLOCKS TO WATERFRONT RESTAURANTS AND DOCKS.
2 MILES FROM MAJOR RETAIL AREA AND RT.95
HEAT, ELECTRICITY, WATER INCLUDED.
HOOK UP FOR CABLE.
WE ARE LOOKING FOR A 6 MONTH LEASE. NEGOTIABLE.
AVAILABLE FOR IMMEDIATE OCCUPANCY.
*While January is the worst month of the year for renting, we expect a high interest from prospective Tenants as Winter's chill dissipates. Commit now to to avoid any future increases!
Sorry. NO PETS as much as they are liked.

***Clubhouse, Seasonal Pool, Laundry Facility, Fitness Center, and MORE***
Located in the bustling Rhode Island, Tanglewood Village Apartments in West Warwick RI, offers residents all the conveniences of city living in a quiet secluded residential neighborhood.

Our apartments will make you feel right at home with brand new plank flooring, modern & chic design, a fully-equipped kitchen including a dishwasher and granite countertops and TONS of closet space!

title: Lease to Own Program - Low Money Down
description: RENT-TO-OWN. Challenged Credit Ok! Option price $429,000
For more info and pictures: Copy and Paste this link: https://showmojo.com/l/21561ae00a
This lovely renovated home is located in the Sun Ridge neighborhood of the desirable East Greenwich. You'll love this Contemporary Cape with full dormer for your family.

Enjoy life in this 5 bed 3 bath, single family home conveniently located near TF Green Airport & Train Stations. And only 20 minutes from Providence. You'll love the full open floor plan for entertaining your friends and family and the finished walkout lower level with full bath , which makes it excellent in-law potential, and a the town's well maintained neighborhood playground.
.Rent-to-own: 18 month lease term, monthly rent is $2995. Option to buy with-in lease term period is between 3.5% - 5% option fee down payment ($15,015 - $21,450).
.Property will be available April, 1, 2020, so secure your future home now.

100% of the Option Fee Down Payment counts towards the option price of the home later on when you go to exercise your option to purchase the house (so it’s NOT like an extra fee just to rent-to-own… ALL of it counts towards the house), but it is always going to be much more than a typical security deposit for a straight rental… Also, challenged credit OK for rent-to-own! We don’t have a “credit score requirement” per se as in a specific #, but we do review your reports to make sure you have a clear game plan on what you need to do to get up to a 640 during the rental phase of the rent-to-own. Rest assured, we work with credit challenges all the time!
